item.title: Gaunt Drift
item.description: The days of winter stretch on long through the year, fir soaking up the sun shone on the dells though less now as we approach solstice. The snow fell heavy last week, dressing every branch and bough Hugging the curves of the world, every curve in sight Now its delicate undriven face falls away with the wind its gaunt drifts revealing bones of ice
